Company Overview.Name: Tube Investments of India Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: One of India’s leading manufacturers of a wide range of products for major industries such as Automotive, Railway, Construction, Mining, Agriculture, etc. The Company’s 3 main verticals are Engineering, Metal Formed Products and Bicycles.  It has forayed into TMT bars and Truck Body Building business and is exploring opportunities in optic lens and other vision systems for the Auto industry.
Company Overview.Market Position: Part of Nifty LargeMidcap 250, Nifty India Manufacturing, BSE 400 MidSmallCap Index, BSE Auto, BSE MidCap, Nifty Midcap 100, Nifty 200, BSE Allcap, BSE Consumer Discretionary, Nifty Midcap 150, Nifty 500 Multicap 50:25:25, Nifty Midcap150 Quality 50, BSE MidCap Select Index, BSE 250 LargeMidCap Index, Nifty Total Market, Nifty500 Multicap Infrastructure 50:30:20, BSE 500, BSE SENSEX Next 50, BSE 150 MidCap Index, BSE 100, BSE 200, BSE Dollex 200, Nifty 500, Nifty MidSmallcap 400

Pros: Company has delivered good profit growth of 38.3% CAGR over last 5 years
Company has a good return on equity (ROE) track record: 3 Years ROE 27.2%
Cons: Stock is trading at 13.1 times its book value
